Episodes.Title: Welcome to the Hellmouth (1)
Episodes.Plot: Determined to have a fresh start, Buffy Summers moves to Sunnydale only to find out that it's located on a Hellmouth and that her slaying duties have just begun.
Episodes.GuestStars: Persia White, Tupelo Jereme, Natalie Strauss, Brian Thompson, Ken Lerner, J. Patrick Lawlor, Eric Balfour, Deborah Brown, Carmine Giovinazzo, Amy Faith Chance, Julie Benz, Marc Metcalf, Kristine Sutherland, David

Episodes.Title: The Harvest (2)
Episodes.Plot: Buffy gradually learns to accept her role as the Slayer and prepares to battle the Master's minions in order to stop the Harvest, a ceremony which will free the Master from his prison in the sewers. Willow and Xander are confided in by Giles about the existence of Vampires and Demons and, although overwhelmed, pledge to help Buffy in her fight.
Episodes.GuestStars: Teddy Lane Jr., Jeffrey Steven Smith, Brian Thompson, Ken Lerner, Eric Balfour, Amy Chance, Persia White, Julie Benz, Marc Metcalf, Kristine Sutherland, David Boreanaz, Mercedes McNab

Episodes.Title: The Witch
Episodes.Plot: When several cheerleaders are involved in strange accidents, Buffy and the gang suspect that one of the cheerleader wannabes is practicing witchcraft and is trying to eliminate her competition.
Episodes.GuestStars: William Monaghan, Amanda Wilmshurst, Nicole Prescott, Jim Doughan, Robin Riker, Kristine Sutherland, Elizabeth Anne Allen

Episodes.Title: Teacher's Pet
Episodes.Plot: While Xander and most of the male population of Sunnydale High fall for the beautiful substitute science teacher Miss French, Buffy is not so sure about her intentions.
Episodes.GuestStars: Karim Oliver, Michael Ross Verona, Jack Knight, William Monaghan, Ken Lerner, Musetta Vander, Jackson Price, Jean Speegle Howard, David Boreanaz

Episodes.Title: Never Kill a Boy on the First Date
Episodes.Plot: Buffy sets her sights on the mysterious and brooding Owen, opting to go on a date rather than help Giles prevent a prophecy about an unstoppable vampire rising to help the Master.
Episodes.GuestStars: Robert Mont, Paul-Felix Montez, Christopher Wiehl, Geoff Meed, Andrew J. Ferchland, Marc Metcalf, David Boreanaz

Episodes.Title: The Pack
Episodes.Plot: While enduring the annual field trip to the Zoo, Xander and several other students enter the quarantined Hyena pen and become possessed with the spirit of the wild animal.
Episodes.GuestStars: Patrese Borem, Jeffrey Steven Smith, Justin Jon Ross, Gregory White, Barbara K. Whinnery, David Brisbin, Ken Lerner, Eion Bailey, Michael McCraine, Brian Gross, Jennifer Sky, Jeff Maynard, James Stephens

Episodes.Title: Angel
Episodes.Plot: Buffy finds herself drawn to the mysterious Angel after he saves her from a gang of vampire warriors, but must ask herself - can a vampire really be a good person or must she do her sworn duty and destroy him?
Episodes.GuestStars: Charles Wesley, Andrew J. Ferchland, Julie Benz, Marc Metcalf, Kristine Sutherland, David Boreanaz

Episodes.Title: I Robot, You Jane
Episodes.Plot: Feeling lonely, Willow turns to a chatroom and meets a charming boy online. She ignores Buffy's concerns about Internet freaks as the rest of the gang discover a new type of demon.
Episodes.GuestStars: Mark Deakins, Damon Sharp, Edith Fields, Pierrino Mascarino, Joss Whedon, Robia LaMorte, Chad Lindberg, Jamison Ryan

Episodes.Title: The Puppet Show
Episodes.Plot: The new principal forces Giles to run Sunnydale High's annual talent show and Buffy, Willow and Xander have to perform against their will. Things get worse as the talent show proves to be a deadly place when one of the participants is found with her heart removed and the clues all point to one boy and his ventriloquist puppet.
Episodes.GuestStars: Michelle Miracle, Krissy Carlson, Natasha Pearce, Chasen Hampton, Lenora May, Richard Werner, Burke Roberts, Tom Wyner, Kristine Sutherland, Armin Shimerman

Episodes.Title: Nightmares
Episodes.Plot: When strange things begin happening to the students at Sunnydale High, it seems that everyone is living their worst nightmares. Buffy and the gang must hold together to stop the phenomena before reality and the nightmare world become one.
Episodes.GuestStars: Sean Moran, Dom Magwili, Patty Ross, Johnny Green, Brian Pietro, Scott Harlan, Terry Urdang, Justin Urich, Jeremy Foley, Dean Butler, J. Robin Miller, Andrew J. Ferchland, Marc Metcalf, Kristine Sutherland

Episodes.Title: Out of Mind, Out of Sight
Episodes.Plot: As Cordelia campaigns for the May Queen Crown, she finds herself the target of an evil invisible force.
Episodes.GuestStars: Scott Gurney, Julie Fulton, Skip Stellrecht, Mark Phelan, John Knight, Denise Y. Dowse, Ryan Bittle, Clea DuVall, , Mercedes McNab, Armin Shimerman, David Boreanaz

Episodes.Title: Prophecy Girl
Episodes.Plot: Buffy's life may hang in the balance as Giles uncovers an ancient book that foretells not only her death, but also the end of the world.
Episodes.GuestStars: Robia LaMorte, Scott Gurney, Andrew J. Ferchland, Marc Metcalf, Kristine Sutherland, David Boreanaz
